label: Love vs. Duty
description: The heart pulls one way while obligation pulls another. Resolution defines identity: traitor, martyr, or reconciler who redefines duty.

label: Freedom vs. Security
description: Craving autonomy while fearing uncertainty. Growth is building systems that protect without imprisoning.

label: Justice vs. Mercy
description: Balancing accountability with compassion. The answer changes case by case; wisdom is the arc.

label: Faith vs. Doubt
description: Belief and skepticism wrestle for sovereignty. Honest doubt purifies faith; brittle certainty shatters when tested.

label: Loyalty vs. Truth
description: Protecting a person versus speaking reality. Choosing truth may betray someone; choosing loyalty may betray many.

label: Ambition vs. Integrity
description: Rising without selling out, or staying small to stay clean. The character defines success by who they become to get it.

label: Self‑Preservation vs. Altruism
description: Survival instincts clash with sacrificial love. Boundaries make sustainable heroism possible.

label: Control vs. Surrender
description: Managing every variable versus accepting limits. Peace appears when influence replaces illusion.

label: Revenge vs. Forgiveness
description: Pain’s demand for payment against healing’s invitation. The choice writes the ending’s tone.

label: Isolation vs. Belonging
description: Safety in solitude against nourishment in community. The arc asks who is worth the risk of being known.

label: Tradition vs. Progress
description: Honoring ancestors versus adapting for the living. Integration is rare and valuable when achieved.

label: Idealism vs. Pragmatism
description: Purity of aim versus usefulness of means. The mature stance is principled pragmatism—not either extreme.

label: Autonomy vs. Connection
description: Independence colliding with intimacy’s demands. Healthy bonds allow individuality inside togetherness.

label: Reason vs. Emotion
description: Analysis against gut and empathy. Great decisions invite both to the table.

label: Courage vs. Caution
description: Bold action against measured risk. Mastery is knowing when each is correct.

label: Honesty vs. Harmony
description: Telling hard truths versus preserving peace. Delivery, timing, and consent turn conflict into growth.

label: Power vs. Service
description: Leading for status versus leading for others. The test is who benefits from every choice.

label: Purity vs. Compassion
description: Uncompromised standards versus mercy for human mess. The arc humanizes the ideal without abandoning it.

label: Loyalty to Family vs. Loyalty to Cause
description: Blood ties against mission vows. The hierarchy chosen reveals core identity.

label: Hope vs. Realism
description: Expecting good versus planning for bad. The synthesis is hopeful realism that invests without naivete.

label: Pride vs. Humility
description: Claiming worth without eclipsing others. Growth is confidence with open ears.

label: Desire vs. Principle
description: Wanting what one’s values forbid. Temptation scenes test the lived reality of the code.

label: Vocation vs. Relationship
description: Work calling against the people who make life worth it. Boundaries and rhythms decide what survives.

label: Forgiveness of Self vs. Penitence
description: Letting go against perpetual penance. True amends enable release; self‑punishment immobilizes.

label: Secrecy vs. Transparency
description: Privacy’s protection versus trust’s requirement. Calibrated disclosure is the adult solution.

label: Stability vs. Growth
description: Keeping the current peace against risking improvement. Stagnation wears a calm mask; courage experiments.

label: Authenticity vs. Acceptance
description: Being true versus being welcomed. The arc asks whether the room that demands disguise is worth staying in.

label: Justice for the Many vs. Mercy for the One
description: Policy versus person in front of you. The character learns when exceptions prove the rule—and when they break it.

label: Duty to Past vs. Duty to Future
description: Honoring promises versus opening possibilities. The pivot is discerning which debts must be paid and which can be forgiven.

label: Seizing Power vs. Sharing Power
description: Efficiency against inclusion. Long‑term outcomes reveal the wiser choice.

label: Trust vs. Self‑Protection
description: Letting others in versus guarding the heart. Healing is risking wisely—testing, then opening.

label: Forging Identity vs. Carrying Legacy
description: Defining self anew against inherited roles. The journey names what to keep and what to lay down.

label: Truth‑Telling vs. Strategic Silence
description: Speaking now versus waiting for greater effect. Timing turns courage into effectiveness.

label: Justice vs. Peace
description: Punishing harm versus ending violence. Sometimes you cannot have both; priorities expose values.

label: Loyalty to Leader vs. Loyalty to Principle
description: Following a person against following an idea. The moment they diverge is the crucible.

label: Sacrifice vs. Self‑Care
description: Giving beyond comfort against preserving capacity to keep giving. Sustainability is a moral stance, not selfishness.
